fullText: Richard Greenberg's ambitious new play about a Jewish family gathering for Christmas dinner in 1980 Manhattan is a frustrating mix of promising elements that never quite gel into a satisfying whole.
dtliExcerpt: Richard Greenberg's ambitious new play about a Jewish family gathering for Christmas dinner in 1980 Manhattan is a frustrating mix of promising elements that never quite gel into a satisfying whole.
